alert.note: Alert for Rockland (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 1:13PM EST until December 20 at 6:00AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Portions of northeast New Jersey, including the following counties, Bergen and Passaic and southeast New York, including the following county, Rockland. * WHEN...Until 315 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. The Saddle River at Ridgewood is in moderate flood stage. River and streams are expected to fall below their banks in the next couple of hours. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 111 PM EST, Flooding is already occurring in the warned area including the Saddle River at Ridgewood. Between 2 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Ridgewood, Ramsey, Hawthorne, Fair Lawn, Wyckoff, Glen Rock, Waldwick, Upper Saddle River, Montvale, Midland Park, Allendale, Woodcliff Lake, Ho-Ho-Kus and Saddle River. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
